Articles.Content:
Hi there.

I'm FuryDrone, I live in Poland and study Automatics and Robotics.

I have few posts already, but here is my official hello world to the community.

I made few ships, currently I'm improving my piloting skills, working on orbital randevous and Minimus to Mun transfers.

Hello, you should check the mods for the Robotics parts .

GL HF XD

Greetings to KSP Fore Arms! Puns aside, the way I do rendezvousing is I get in a very slightly smaller (Or bigger) orbit than the craft I want to Rendezvous with, and then wait to get close up, and once I get close I just follow my instincts, usually if it's a crew transfer I get out of the ship at around 2 kilometers away. Hope that helps!

I already downloaded Damned Robotics before, awesome mod. :]

Thanks for warm welcome.
Hey. For orbital rendavous just ask me and ill post a video to help ya if you want
